NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Retention and Absenteeism or the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Turnover?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Performance and Engagement or the cell corresponding to Retention and Satisfaction?
